title: Can I use Creams, Botox, injections to remove wrinkles? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: Hamza says I have wrinkles in my forehead and the doctors suggested that I use expensive creams and maybe to have injections like botox or something like that which would remove these wrinkles is this permissible answers yes there's no problem in using it providing it is medically safe if it's medically safe and the ingredients used are Halal there's no problem in removing such wrinkles in sha Allah
